subject: Baseball
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: Nationals pitcher Shawn Hill won his salary arbitration case Saturday when a panel awarded him the $775,000 contract he sought instead of the $500,000 the team offered.
snippet: Nationals pitcher Shawn Hill won his salary arbitration case Saturday when a panel awarded him the $775,000 contract he sought instead of the $500,000 the team offered.
